title: Forward Air Corporation (FWRD) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Forward Air Corporation (NASDAQ:FWRD) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 11, 2025 4:30 PM ETCompany ParticipantsJamie G.
content:
Welcome to the Forward Air Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call. [Operator Instructions] I would now like to turn the call over to Tony Carreno, Senior Vice President of Treasury and Investor Relations.

Thank you, operator, and good afternoon, everyone. Welcome to Forward Air's Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call. With us this afternoon are: Shawn Stewart, Chief Executive Officer; and Jamie Pierson, Chief Financial Officer.

By now, you should have received a press release announcing Forward Air's Second quarter 2025 results, which was also furnished to the SEC on Form 8-K. We have also furnished a slide presentation outlining second quarter 2025 earnings, highlights and a business update. Both the press release and slide presentation for this call are accessible on the Investor Relations section of Forward Air's website forwardair.com.

Please be aware that certain statements in the company's earnings release announcement and on the conference call are forward- looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. This includes statements which are based on expectations, intentions and projections regarding the company's future performance, anticipated events or trends and other matters that are not historical facts, including statements regarding our fiscal year 2025. These statements are not a guarantee of future performance and are subject to known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other

summary: The Forward Air Corporation (FWRD) is hosting a Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call, with Shawn Stewart, Chief Executive Officer and Jamie Pierson, Chief Financial Officer. The company has issued a press release announcing its results and a slide presentation outlining the quarter's results. However, some of these statements are considered forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995.
shortSummary: Forward Air's Second Quarter 2025 earnings call will include CEO Shawn Stewart and CFO Jamie Pierson, with details of the company's performance outlined in a press release and slide presentation.
argos_summary: Forward Air held its Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call, featuring CEO Shawn Stewart and CFO Jamie Pierson. The company released its earnings results and a slide presentation, both available on its Investor Relations website. Participants were reminded that certain statements made during the call are forward-looking and subject to risks and uncertainties.
